segments.text: Do you surf online regularly , Joe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I stay online for four hours at least every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you crazy ? What are you doing four hours online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Millions of things . I surf the Net , check my e-mail , and most importantly , I chat with my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Online chat ? Aren't you afraid of meeting bad people who pretend to be what they are not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I am not . And I love to meet new people in the chat rooms who share a lot in common with me .
segments.speaker: S2
